pkgmetadata.longdescription: # conda-store server[![Documentation Status](https://readthedocs.org/projects/conda-store/badge/?version=latest)](https://conda-store.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest)A multi-tenant server for managing Conda environments. See the[documentation](https://conda-store.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) formore information.
